bug.author: eraoul
bug.summary: Docker doesn't support GPU for mac OS (doc clarification request)
bug.description:
The docs present instructions for installing via Docker on MacOS. GPU support isn't mentioned explicitly, but it seems that GPU (nvidia-docker) can't be supported for MacOS. See here: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/NVIDIA/nvidia-docker/issues/175>NVIDIA/nvidia-docker#175</denchmark-link>
If I'm right that GPU is a no-go for Docker on Mac OS, I'd like to see this up-front in the documentation (e.g., write "GPU support not possible on MacOS X in Docker") to prevent people from going down the wrong path.
